description: Generate LaTeX code for a two-page vertical daily planner for any chosen year. The generated output can be converted or printed using conversion tools such as pandoc, pdflatex, or xetex. More information: https://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/macros/latex/contrib/yplan.

useCases.description: Create a daily planner with specified language, lettercase (uppercase or lowercase) and year:
